chapters.title: Chapter 4:  A Deal
chapters.info: Jori Congar, p. 157—Man from the Two Rivers. He is very skinny, but still eats twice what anyone else does. He will also drink so he cannot stand if given the chance. He is a good shot with a bow and arrows, close behind Jondyn. He is also a skilled pickpocket. Editor's note: Jori Congar is not to be confused with Jori, Morvrin's Warder. See also Jori.
